#summary Basic information about this library

= Introduction =

The Genome Convergence Pipeline library is an API for running batch-enabled high-throughput analyses of aligned genomic data, primarily to explore signals of molecular convergence.


= Details =

*This API is at alpha level only*
This readme is a placeholder until we have tested the package to beta level. 
For more questions please contact Joe Parker: j.d.parker@qmul.ac.uk
